body:
To build parsomonnator on non x86_64 host, I changed as follows:
* axml.c was include xmmintrin.h when host is not powerPC. I changed include only host is x86_64.
* Add Makefile.nosse for non-x86 hosts.
* sse variant change to False.
* Add check sse and avx variant dose not set non-x86 hosts.
title: parsimonator: Enable build on non x86_64 hosts.
